caption.p: SEM images of ZFO anodes at different magnifications. Comparison between: a) pristine ZFO negative electrodes and b) ZFO-deLi, c) ZFO-200 and d) ZFO-600 electrodes after 10 000 cycles at 3 mA cm âˆ’2. The white dashed lines highlight the regions more affected by the agglomeration of the ZFO nanoparticles.
